item.title: How Many Requests get uBlocked on 50 of the Most Linked Domains
item.description: A look at the number of blocked requests for 50 of the top domains based on mozRank.

item.title: Chromebook Sales still have a lot of Potential
item.description: Recent market research predicts that Chromebook sales will increase by 27 percent in 2015, an impressive number but with room upwards.

item.title: Chromebook Statistics: Models by Brand, Year and Specs Distributions
item.description: This page shows statistics for all Chromebooks in the Linux-Netbook.com database. These statistics are updated automatically every time a new Chromebook is added.

item.title: Smartphone Operating System Market Share Visualization
item.description: These data visualizations show the market share distribution for major smartphone operating systems since 2007. The data only includes operating systems on sold devices marketed as smartphones.

item.title: Which Domains Contribute Most to the Linux Kernel?
item.description: A bar graph showing the top 30 Internet domains by count of commits to the Linux kernel. The domains were extracted from author email addresses.
